metadata.complexity_focus: Comprehensive range of queries from basic chain metrics to expert-level analysis covering DeFi protocols, MEV, liquid staking, risk analysis, market structure, and cross-protocol interactions. Suitable for users at all levels from beginners to advanced researchers.
